ruleContent.content:
<js>
jm=java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name="client"]@content'));
if(jm.length()>1){
var conts = [],list=[];
code=result.match(/codeurl="(\d+)";/)[1];
data=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
datas=data.select("p[style*='text-indent']");
jm=String(jm).split(/[A-Z]+%/);
for(i=0;i<jm.length;i++){
	k=Math.ceil((i + 1) % parseInt(code));
	j=Math.ceil(jm[i] - k);
	conts[j]=datas[i];
	}
	for(i in conts){
		c=String(conts[i]).replace(/.*本章尚未读完,请.*一页继续阅读.*/g,'');
		list.push(c);
		list.join("\n");
		}
	}else{java.getString(".novelcontent@html")}
</js>
